nodes.title: split path out and remove deprecated APIs
set single choince mode only in master-detail view
Deprecate handling of "up" and HasParent interface
Path is baked in. Entry is private. Dispatcher can change.
AppFlowContextFactory should give delegate its own context to destroy.
Sample app shows master /detail in tablet landscape.
Doc tweak for Flow.Listener#go, unit test for that contract.
replaceTo and goUp preserve equivalent prefix
Keep original screen on stack if found by resetTo
reset to new screen should push
Bump plugins and move to Java 7
Upgraded ButterKnife dependency in sample project
Inject conversations and friends in views instead of directly accessing SampleData
Jesses says addsTo is going away.
Swap the names of `framesFromTop` and `framesFromBottom` so they're correct.
Update exception message when flow is accessed too early
Don't overload alpha2 in the changelog
Update RELEASING.md to call for running integration tests.
Fixes annotation on InternalLifecycleIntegration#require, it's NonNull.
Runs our espresso tests on Travis.
JavaDoc for Flow#get, explaining when it's safe to call.
HelloWorld test, fix Intents test package name.
Enqueue goBack() calls, because they can come asynchronously.
Fixes intent handling and adds sample app, test for it.
Allow saving state for multiple views in a single State (for MultiKeys)
Let services can be found via Context#getSystemService.
Fixed starting activity / linkify / design support library
Adds missing short-circuit in sample BasicDispatcher.
Demo how to do an orientation lock per-screen.
Parent services binding performed before children's for MultiKey.
Crash when saving tree with duplicate View ids
canGoBack logic fixed according to documentation for Flow::goBack.
Null check added for node variable inside of KeyManager::decrementAnd…
Restore requested for setDispatcher call in onResume.
Add exception when using flow incorrectly
Add docs on KeyChanger, sample that saves view state
Prevent KeyManager from setting up services for a key on config change
pull classes up to top level
Added replaceHistory() and replaceTop() convenience methods
Use app to unregister lifecycle callbacks
Simple walkthrough test for multikey sample
KeyDispatcher always has a non-null KeyChanger
selectHistory should favor restoring history from instance state
Navigation with Flow now destroys Mortar-scopes only if they are not found in the destination traversal
History.clear() now preserves view state (e.g. in new process).
Give History.Builder some more useful pop ops
Adding ability to peek view state without creating builders
Allows PathContainer to work w/o PatchContainerView. Deletes sample app.
Fixes builder regression: pop() used to be nullable
Don't save empty list if all states are filtered
History.Builder no longer loses internal state
Ray/rebase name change and split path
Fix tests broken by set > setBackstack
